title: When the Finely Tuned Spotlight Falls on the Lighting Designer
description: Jennifer Tipton, whose job usually entails serving the vision of choreographers and directors, has made her own show, the installation “Our Days and Night.”
dc:creator: Brian Seibert
media:credit: Balarama Heller for The New York Times
media:description: Jennifer Tipton working on “Our Days and Night” at the Baryshnikov Arts Center.
